author: Nexxed
title: Update v2.0.1-beta
content: Added new emojis to the shoutbox that directly replace the existing ones (new emoji picker coming soon, maybe)
Added the ability to save custom themes and scripts to a personal list for later selection
Added support for loading more than one theme
Added scripting API with support for interface elements
Updated to a new UI framework, powered by Vue.js for seamless integration
